title: 沉浸工程怎么改斗轮式挖掘机的效率？？？
author: 诡丶夜Mike
txt_content: 斗轮式挖矿机太变态了，一晚上挖了大半个钻石箱子的矿物，怎么改挖掘机的效率？

replies.author: 嘻嘻嘻呵呵
replies.txt_content:
在配置文件中找到“ImmersiveEngineering.cfg”中的

  # The maximum amount of yield one can get out of a chunk with the excavator. Set a number smaller than zero to make it infinite
    I:"Excavator: Mineral Depletion"=96000

“96000”即为最大矿物产量

replies.author: aonitou960125
replies.txt_content:
# The speed of the Excavator. Basically translates to how many degrees per tick it will turn.
    D:"Excavator: Speed"=1.0

我记得是这一段，把那个数字改小，挖矿机的速度就会慢下来
这一段
    # The chance that the Excavator will not dig up an ore with the currently downward-facing bucket.
    D:"Excavator: Chance"=0.05

把数字改大可以增大挖矿机无法挖出矿石的几率，这个对挖矿机的影响挺大的

或者是这一段
    # The RF per tick the Excavator will consume to dig
    I:"Excavator: Consumed"=4096

把那个数字搞大，就会增加挖矿机的能耗，限制一下挖矿机
还有
    # The maximum amount of yield one can get out of a chunk with the excavator. Set a number smaller than zero to make it infinite
    I:"Excavator: Mineral Depletion"=96800

把数字改小就可以限制挖矿机的挖掘数量，别改成负数了

以上这四段综合一下可以把挖矿机砍废
